DOC.criteria: Men woman ethnic background ; live New York tristate area ; fluent English ; normal correct normal vision hearing ; willing complete study procedure ; capable give write informed consent . A history gross brain abnormality stroke , severe ventriculomegaly severe periventricular white matter abnormality ; history serious psychiatric neurological disorder , include psychosis major depression , alcohol drug abuse , brain injury , seizure disorder , brain tumor , etc . ; take psychoactive medication , include antipsychotic , anxiolytic antidepressant , cognitive enhancer cholinesterase inhibitor ; presence contraindication MEG MRI recording , include follow : cardiac pacemaker , intracranial clip , metal implant , external clip within 10 mm head , metal eye , claustrophobia , obesity and/or reason lead difficulty stay MEG MRI one hour .
